title: [Upper Trollfang, Glatoph]
description: Two side paths branch off of the main trail here, running east and west around the mountain.  The north-south path is steeper, but is wider and more deeply worn even so.  A cold wind blows in from the east, and you see signs of snow on the eastern slopes.  The western face seems a bit warmer -- you even fancy you glimpse some green grass in the distance in that direction.

Two side paths branch off of the main trail here, running east and west around the mountain.  The north-south path is steeper, but is wider and more deeply worn even so.  A cold wind blows in from the east, and you see signs of snow glimmering in the moonlight on the eastern slopes.  The western face seems a bit warmer -- the deeper shadows in that direction might be grass.
paths: Obvious paths: east, west, up, down
